blogPost.title:
Super League clubs by most recent league title:

AC Milan: 2011
Arsenal: 2004
Atlético: 2014
Barcelona: 2019
Chelsea: 2017
Inter: 2010
Juventus: 2020
Liverpool: 2020
Man City: 2019
Man Utd: 2013
Real Madrid: 2020
Tottenham: 1961
blogPost.author: The Spectator Index

localize.full_text:
